survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Childcare Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the company's on-site childcare facilities, gather feedback on current services, and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you utilize the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you utilize the on-site childcare facilities?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons for using the on-site childcare facilities? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'Few times a month' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select responses. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons for using the on-site childcare facilities? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'Few times a month' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided at the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'Few times a month' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with radio buttons. Avoid neutral bias.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided at the on-site childcare facilities?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'Few times a month' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.client_notes: Open-text response. Limit to 500 characters for concise feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text (OPEN_TEXT) with character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facilities?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the on-site childcare facilities to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'Few times a month' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection. Include a 'Not sure' option.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the on-site childcare facilities to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'Few times a month' in Q1
